     i will check

11.6.17  9:38 am   is your page family friendly

     you will have to go there with your family, and see if you have a friendly time

11.6.17  9:11 am   Do you actually love all the things that are listed near the end of your "what is love" video?

     those are examples of things a person could love

11.6.17  6:13 am   why dont you accept the fact that making a music video for a 3 minute long song in 2 weeks is not possible for you?

     because i haven't really had very many attempts yet. there is a lot of room to improve still

     i would find it reasonable to change the expectations of you finishing a music video to 5 weeks.

     i think you might be underestimating the amount of content we are dealing with here

11.6.17  3:54 am   i find it very unfurtunate that you don't put ads on your videos since you dont get money from your work and if you don't like ads why not put up a patreon?

     i find it very unfortunate that you didn't even bother to check to see if i have one

     i don't think people will hate you or not watch your videos if you choose to monetize your content ps im worried about your financial stability as a model citzen should 

     what if i worry about your financial stability. and also the viewing experience and viewer retention rate on my channel, and in turn my long term success and brand growth

11.6.17  3:08 am   How about making intros for people for free?

     i already make intros for myself for free. actually sometimes i skip the intro but i make the entire video for myself, for free

     Also, get a font.

     i have some. how about you get one

11.6.17  2:09 am   what makes live action more time consuming? i would have thought all the animation and crazy color effects would be the most time-consuming part of a project

     the way i do it, there's kind of a million clips flying all over the place. and i gotta make sure they are all as good as possible. so i gotta do a trillion. and then i have to sort them all out and figure out which ones to put when, and where. also gotta do graphics on top of that

11.6.17  1:00 am   Was your love on the q train mutual?

     it has been returned, by others

     because they can walk too good

Both of the piano parts? Yknow,? Also I've o my just started and I'm trying to get the hang of playing with two hands but I'm stumbling a lol bit, ill ask Google

11.5.17  4:00 pm   I feel angry and scared that we have already done so much irreversible damage to earth, but no one gives a crap about it,

     that's not true, i think everyone cares about it

      or is a denier of climate change.

     i think people may disagree on the exact details, because to be fair it's hard to know the exact details

     And now America has a president sponsored by oil companies who wish to keep things the way they are.

     it's not drastically different from the way it has already been for quite a while

     What should we do?

     continue to be the best person you can be. the problems you mentioned are very similar to the problem of a catarpillar blooming into a butterfly. before it happens you might think 'how the heck would this ever happen'. but it will happen suddenly, spectacularly, right on schedule, and it will use techniques that are beyond your wildest imagination

11.5.17  3:52 pm   Any tips on what I should look for in getting a vocal mic (like one I can plug into my computer to record singing, not for live performance). I know you don't want to advertise a specific brand or model or anything.. but are there like, I don't know, particular features or something like I should look for? Or are they all the same and it's just the more expensive ones sound better? I really have no experience or knowledge about recording singing, so I'm not sure what to look for or where to start.

     if you want to know my strategy, it is: use whatever you already have. if you literally don't have anything that is in any way capable of recording your voice (and i think you do, but in case you live in the desert or something) then use the one that is absolutely easiest for you to obtain. don't do a damn thing better until you are used to the way it sounds and know what you can do with it. if you 'don't know where to start' then it's not time for you to give a damn about which mic you use. it's time to give a damn about whether someone can understand the words you are saying. 120 years ago they made records out of wax, and they had a damn good time doing it

     i just looked it up and it seems cool until you realize that it has way way too close resemblence to the kkk wardrobe

11.5.17  8:46 am   Why is there a text telling me to ask a question while I'm on the ueqstions page ?

     just to remind you of what you can use the box for

11.5.17  2:46 am   i am so lonely that i type out inane things to a man i have never met and most probably never will in the hopes that he will type something in return, causing me to feel heard and validated, even if the question was something like 'do horse butts have hopes and dreams', and when this man does not pick my message out of hundreds it feels like a personal failure and i imagine him looking at what i sent and wrinkling his nose and going 'eugh' and scrolling on past and that image hurts like hell and causes me to feel way more proud than i should when i am answered because that supposedly means i wrote something brilliant enough to deserve an answer but really it was just something that he could think of a response to, and i imagine him answering that question but still wrinkling his nose at it because of how dumb it is, but reading his answers to people who expect him to be annoyed by certain questions/etc. and the rest of his answers in general seem to show tha t that image isn't accurate but i still fear that my questions are bad, but keeping this in mind calms me enough to send in stupid shit anyway because it's fun and it's nice to share fun even if you can't know for sure if the other person likes it, because the alternative would be to hold onto every thought, light and heavy like helium balloons and stones tied to strings, forever without anyone getting to know your way of fun or perhaps helping you to carry the heavy stuff.


anyway this is a cordial invitation to my underwater tea party, b.y.o.a.t. (bring your own air tank), located in the sea of okhotsk at coordinates 52.996011, 147.384337. check the box that indicates whether or not you consent to hug and be hugged warmly and egregiously by other consenting guests

[ ] yes please

[ ] no thank you, not really much of a hugger

     hi. i don't have time to go to the party, but i just wanna say you are doing a great job, and very passionate and creative, and keep up the great work

11.5.17  12:18 am   Do you consider yourself a surrealist?

     it is in my tool kit, but not necessarily my job title

     no
